sentences.sentence: She might, in one of her phases, have been a prophetess.
sentences.translation: 她也许会在自己的某一时期成为一名女先知。

sentences.sentence: My username is the name of a prophetess in Norse mythology.
sentences.translation: 我的用户名是名称的先知在北欧神话。

sentences.sentence: He was of the Tribe of Judah and his wife was a prophetess.
sentences.translation: 他是属犹大支派，他的妻子是位女先知。
